comment.body:
The idea of trying to create a mesh network that wasn't controlled by any entity is interesting. - How to connect groups of people where they aren't interfered with by a government would be hard if it was done via some wireless method. 

As someone who ran a BBS back in the 80's. Those kind of connections were direct dialed.  I imagine the calls could have been monitored. But even if they were the email messages could have been encrypted with PGP.
